2.1.0
file=source
length=3 
steps=600
stride=1
degree=0
gpu_buffer_size=2
cpu_buffer_size=3
num_writes=2
# If the finest grid has grid spacing h = 1.0 (top block),
# then:
# * the first source should map to i=1 j=2 in block 0 (top block)
# * the second source should map to i=0 j=0 in block 1 (bottom block)

coordinates
0 9.5 8.5 -2.0
0 9.5 8.5 -11.0
0 9.5 8.5 -34.0
